Html: I have separate CSS files for IE and other browsers (style.css and style.ie.css) which should be compressed separately, bur now pattern can accept only * and ? wildcards. It will be useful to add regex support for folder's pattern attribute

Presently only support * and ?

Code use function Directory.GetFiles

Yes, i know, saw it in source. You can just add Regex attribute to folder element and filter result of Directory.GetFiles by it. Another variant is just to add string exlude attribute and filter by it's contents
